column1: Ruby was the eleventh child of [[Samwise Gamgee]] and [[Rose Cotton]].<ref>{{App
Ruby follows the custom of noble [[Hobbits
column2: Hobbit]] women to be named after jewels, e.g. [[Ruby Bolger]]. The jewel [[wikipedia:ruby
column3: ruby]] derives from Latin ''rubeus'' "reddish".<ref>[[Jim Allan]], ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
